channel.title: [PI] Jarmaking help
channel.description: I have a PI server and I tried over 10 tutorials, No one worked for me, just when i finish jarsigning and everything in the tut, I go to the 'client.jar' which I just jarsigned, when I double click the client.jar nothing happens... what should I do?

item.title: [PI] Jarmaking help
item.dc:creator: @begineer begineer
item.description:
@begineer wrote:

Do you have MSN or Skype so I can contact you? If so, PM it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Jarmaking help
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

class files are the compiled versions of the .java files.

After using a compiler a new set of files are created/updated and the extension is .class

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Jarmaking help
item.dc:creator: @begineer begineer
item.description:
@begineer wrote:

[quote=“slump40, post:2, topic:460767”]If you want i can jar it for you. (Only if your comfortable with that) I actually just learned how to make a successful .jar myself, so i don’t mind helping

Just PM me a link to the client (Only class files if you wish) and ill make the jar for ya.[/quote]
what you mean class files, im really new at this things…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Jarmaking help

item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

If you want i can jar it for you. (Only if your comfortable with that) I actually just learned how to make a successful .jar myself, so i don’t mind helping
